0.8.15.name: wordpress/wpsupercountdown
0.8.15.description: With WPSuperCountdown you can hide some content (like whole articles, links, graphics, or videos) for a definable period of time. When the countdown reaches 00:00:00 the hidden content will show up and replace the former counter. Also a cookie will be set so the user don't see the specific counter again but the whole article without latency.
